Posts.Content: jpfina wrote: Hi, just began reading everyone's experience and found it so helpful that I decided to join and share my own.  I was diagnosed the beginning of October, 2013 and had a double mastectomy Oct 24.  Expanders are in and have completed the fill. I'm starting the road to chemo on January 6th, with the 6 treatment regiment. After reading so many of your experience's, I feel I'm equipped for battle. I'm going to CVS to buy the Claritan, Benedryl, Biotene, Ginger capsules, etc.  It has been re-assuring knowing what to expect, it takes the edge off.   I'm the only one of all my friends with breast cancer, so there isn't anyone I can compare notes with.  Having found this site and reading what everyone wrote, has been a blessing.   Wishing everyone a Healthy, Happy New Year Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: TC Therapy jpfina dlb823
